rationale: The agent renamed the task to 'generateTransportVersions' (plural) instead of 'generateTransportVersion' (singular) as specified in the ground truth. This is a critical error because the task name is part of the public API that developers use. The plural form contradicts the task description which states it '(Re)generates a transport version definition file' (singular). All 12 occurrences across the 3 files use the incorrect plural name, making this a consistent but fundamentally wrong implementation. The task was to make the name shorter and clearer - 'generateTransportVersion' achieves this by removing 'Definition', while the agent's choice of 'generateTransportVersions' adds conceptual confusion by implying multiple versions when the task generates a single definition file.
